resources.string: It is an electronic device that helps you pick up objects or cut things.Controlling it from your mobile. It has four head tools: snippers large and small,scissors and nailclippers.
Connect to Pressmatic via bluetooth to continue.
Press and hold the open or close button. You can adjust the speed to low, medium or high.
Turn ON to cut and OFF to stop.You can adjust the speed to low, medium or high.
Placed the nail clipper in the desired position and press CUT to make a complete cut.
You can change the display language and consult the help on the top buttons.
Connect to pressmatic via bluetooth for continue.
You need to activate the bluetooth of your phone to connect to pressmatic,\n ¿Do you want to activate it now?
